languages.text: {n}Золоченые хроно в руках подсказывают, что прошло уже два терранских часа. За это время мышцы порядком затекли, а голова значительно потяжелела. В очередной раз обведя взглядом закуток мостика, что приспособила для своего пребывания эльдарка, вы краем сознания ловите на себе чей-то острый, внимательный взгляд.{/n}

{n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Золоченые хроно в руках подсказывают, что прошло уже два терранских часа. За это время мышцы порядком затекли, а голова значительно потяжелела. В очередной раз обведя взглядом закуток мостика, что приспособила для своего пребывания эльдарка, вы краем сознания ловите на себе чей-то острый, внимательный взгляд.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two Terran hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}

When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}El crono dorado que llevas en las manos indica que ya han transcurrido dos horas del turno. Tienes los músculos agarrotados y te pesa la cabeza. Cuando tus ojos vuelven a posarse en el rincón del puente de mando que Yrliet ha adoptado como suyo, ves que alguien te mira con atención.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El crono dorado que llevas en las manos indica que ya han transcurrido dos horas terranas. Tienes los músculos agarrotados y te pesa la cabeza. Cuando tus ojos vuelven a posarse en el rincón del puente de mando que Yrliet ha adoptado como suyo, ves que alguien te mira con atención.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}手首の金装飾が施されたクロノを見ると、ウォッチ換算で2時間も経過していた。筋肉はこわばり、頭が首に重くのしかかる。ユリエットが自分用に改造したブリッジの狭い箇所に目をやると、誰かの鋭く注意深い視線が目に飛び込んできた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手首の金装飾が施されたクロノを見ると、ウォッチ換算で2時間も経過していた。筋肉はこわばり、頭が首に重くのしかかる。ユリエットが自分用に改造したブリッジの狭い箇所に目をやると、誰かの鋭く注意深い視線が目に飛び込んできた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}你手中的镀金计时器显示，两巡的时间已经过去了。你浑身肌肉僵硬，脖子上的脑袋仿佛愈发沉重。当你再次环顾这一小段被伊莉耶特改造为己用的舰桥时，你察觉到了某人敏锐而专注的目光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你手中的镀金计时器显示，两个泰拉时已经过去了。你浑身肌肉僵硬，脖子上的脑袋仿佛愈发沉重。当你再次环顾这一小段被伊莉耶特改造为己用的舰桥时，你察觉到了某人敏锐而专注的目光。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Votre chrono doré vous indique que deux heures de quart se sont déjà écoulées. Vos muscles sont raides et votre tête est lourde. Lorsque vous jetez un nouveau coup d'œil en direction du recoin de la passerelle qu'Yrliet a adapté à son usage personnel, vous croisez un regard attentif braqué sur vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre chrono doré vous indique que deux heures terriennes se sont déjà écoulées. Vos muscles sont raides et votre tête est lourde. Lorsque vous jetez un nouveau coup d'œil en direction du recoin de la passerelle qu'Yrliet a adapté à son usage personnel, vous croisez un regard attentif braqué sur vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das vergoldete Chrono in deinen Händen sagt dir, dass schon zwei Stunden der Wache verstrichen sind. Deine Muskeln sind steif, und dein Kopf fühlt sich schwer auf deinem Hals an. Als du dich in dem kleinen Bereich der Brücke umsiehst, den Yrliet für ihre persönliche Nutzung adaptiert hat, bemerkst du, dass dich jemand scharf und aufmerksam ansieht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das vergoldete Chrono in deinen Händen sagt dir, dass schon zwei terranische Stunden verstrichen sind. Deine Muskeln sind steif und dein Kopf fühlt sich schwer auf deinem Hals an. Als du dich in dem kleinen Bereich der Brücke umsiehst, den Yrliet für ihre persönliche Nutzung adaptiert hat, bemerkst du, dass dich jemand scharf und aufmerksam ansieht.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avuçlarındaki yaldızlı krono, nöbetinin hâlihazırda iki saati doldurduğunu haber veriyor. Kaslarının sertleştiğini ve kafanı artık düzgün tutamadığını hissediyorsun. Yrliet'in köprüde kendine göre düzenlediği küçük bölüme bir kez daha göz attığın sırada, birisinin sana attığı keskin ve dikkatli bakışları yakalıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gilded chrono in your hands tells you that two watch hours have already elapsed. Your muscles feel stiff and your head feels heavy on your neck. When you next glance around the small section of the bridge that Yrliet has adapted for her own use, you catch someone's sharp, attentive gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Avuçlarındaki yaldızlı krono, nöbetinin hâlihazırda iki saati doldurduğunu haber veriyor. Kaslarının sertleştiğini ve kafanı artık düzgün tutamadığını hissediyorsun. Yrliet'in köprüde kendine göre düzenlediği küçük bölüme bir kez daha göz attığında birisinin sana attığı keskin ve dikkatli bakışları yakalıyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
